s0251: Hui Gong because Chong Er outside, feared Li Ke make change, granted Li Ke die.
s0252: Told said: 'Without Li Zi I not obtain establish.
s0253: Although, you also killed two lords one grand master, for your lord not also difficult?'
s0254: Li Ke answered said: 'Not have abolished, lord what with rise?
s0255: Wish execute him, his no words?
s0259: Then Pi Zheng sent thank Qin not returned, so not reached difficulty.
s0260: Jin lord changed buried Gong crown prince Shen Sheng.
s0261: Autumn, Hu Tu below country, met Shen Sheng, Shen Sheng with rode told him said: 'Yi Wu without ritual, I obtained request at Di, will with Jin give Qin, Qin will sacrifice me.'
s0262: Hu Tu answered said: 'Minister heard spirits not eat not their ancestor, lord sacrifice perhaps cut off?
s0264: Shen Sheng said: 'Yes, I will again request Di.
s0265: After ten days, Xin Cheng west side will have shaman see me.'
s0267: And period went, again seen, Shen Sheng told him said: 'Di permitted punish guilty, decayed at Han.'
s0268: Child then sang: 'Gong crown prince changed buried, after fourteen years, Jin also not prosper, prosper then at elder brother.'
s0270: Pi Zheng sent Qin, heard Li Ke executed, then persuaded Qin Mu Gong said: 'Lu Sheng, Xi Cheng, Ji Rui truly not follow.
s0271: If heavy bribe with plot, exit Jin lord, enter Chong Er, matter must succeed.'
s0272: Qin Mu Gong permitted it, sent people with return report Jin, thick bribed three sons.
s0273: Three sons said: 'Money thick words sweet, this must Pi Zheng sell us to Qin.'
s0274: Then killed Pi Zheng and Li Ke, Pi Zheng party seven chariot grand masters.
s0275: Pi Zheng son Bao fled Qin, spoke attack Jin, Mu Gong not listened.
s0276: Hui Gong establish, betrayed Qin land and Li Ke, executed seven chariot grand masters, country people not attached.
s0277: Second year, Zhou sent Zhao Gong Guo ritual Jin Hui Gong, Hui Gong ritual arrogant, Zhao Gong criticized him.
s0278: Fourth year, Jin famine, begged grain at Qin.
s0279: Mu Gong asked Bai Li Xi, Bai Li Xi said: 'Heaven calamity circulate, country alternate have, save calamity relieve neighbor, country's way.
s0281: Pi Zheng son Bao said: 'Attack it.'
s0282: Mu Gong said: 'Its lord evil, its people what crime!'
s0283: Finally gave grain, from Yong to Jiang.
s0284: Fifth year, Qin famine, requested grain at Jin.
s0285: Jin lord planned it, Qing Zheng said: 'With Qin obtained establish, already betrayed its land agreement.
s0286: Jin famine Qin lent me, now Qin famine request grain, give it what doubt?
s0288: Guo She said: 'Previous year heaven with Jin granted Qin, Qin not know take lent me.
s0289: Now heaven with Qin granted Jin, Jin its can reverse heaven?
s0291: Hui Gong used Guo She plan, not gave Qin grain, sent troops moreover attacked Qin.
s0292: Qin great anger, also sent troops attacked Jin.
s0293: Sixth year spring, Qin Mu Gong led troops attacked Jin.
s0294: Jin Hui Gong told Qing Zheng said: 'Qin troops deep, what do?'
s0295: Zheng said: 'Qin inner lord, lord betrayed its bribe;
s0296: Jin famine Qin transported grain, Qin famine Jin betrayed it, then wished because its famine attack it: its deep not also suitable!'
s0297: Jin divined drove right, Qing Zheng all auspicious.
s0299: Then changed commanded Bu Yang drove chariot, Jia Pu Tu as right, advanced troops.
s0300: Ninth month Ren Xu, Qin Mu Gong, Jin Hui Gong combined battle Han Yuan.
